name: designare
description: Michael Kanda - Web Purist & SEO Expert

scripts.build: node js/generate-knowledge.js && node generate-sitemap.js && node js/inject-ratings.js && mkdir -p public && cp -r *.html *.css *.svg *.csv js css images Font CSV-Importer-PRO downloads public/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'Some assets missing, continuing...'
